header.tagline: Supply Chain Head – Global Operations & Efficiency Expert

summary: Supply Chain expert with over 15 years of experience in operational transformation and cost reduction in SaaS and Pharma, achieving $75M P&L reductions and improving supply chain efficiency by 30%.

bullets.text: Designed and implemented the restructuring process for the regionalization of LETIS, optimizing overall business operations, resulting in a 15% increase in operational efficiency.
Executed a complete redesign of the procurement process at SGS, tailored for each business unit, resulting in a 25% cost reduction within the first year of implementation.
Oversaw operations across Argentina, Paraguay, Uruguay, Chile, and Bolivia, applying 'Open+' methodology in regional distribution centers, resulting in productivities worth $12.5M.
Reduced finished product Days of Inventory from 45 to 15, achieving a cost reduction in P&L amounting to $75M.
Drove the nationalization of imported materials, achieving a 75% transition due to SIRAs situation.
Led cultural transformation from S&OP way of work to IBP methodology across the organization, resulting in a 20% improvement in cross-departmental collaboration.
Managed Supply & Demand Planning, Material Management, and ComEx teams in two productive plants, aligning production plans with LATAM demand forecasts.
Implemented on-site 4PL replacement process, enhancing logistics efficiency.
Integrated Order 2 Cash and ComEx departments, streamlining processes and improving cash flow by $2.7M during the pandemic.
Pioneered entry into the food industry for temperature-controlled shipments, leading to a 32% increase in shipment volume through tier 2 customers.
Secured two tier 1 pharma tenders, managing operational activities and expanding market presence.
Led Latam planning HUB design and SAP APO implementation from Manugistics, achieving a 98% Customer Service Level.
Reduced regional market level stock from $76.9M to $57.7M, optimizing working capital and inventory management.
Facilitated the successful launch of 45 new products regionally with optimal market availability.
Established an 18-month rolling forecast and monthly S&OP process, improving forecast accuracy significantly, from 45% to 85%.
Reduced Slow Moving and Obsolete (SLOB) inventories by 50% at a finished product level.
Launched 28 new products on time by spearheading the New Product Launch Committee.
Enhanced Forecast Accuracy from 98% to 99.3% while maintaining a Customer Service Level of 99.7%.
Coordinated the transfer of 25 originally imported products to local production, mitigating the impact of DJAI regulations.
Implemented a Drop Shipment process, resulting in budget savings of 35% for the region.
Established 3M & 6M purchasing forecasts with distributors, enhancing supply chain reliability.
Implemented the LogEx system, improving logistical operational excellence.
Provided training and consulting for operational teams in Brazilian and Argentinian plants, in collaboration with Accenture.
